widgets_values: Grow the mask if some of the face is still visible

**Built on ComfyUI v0.8.0**

Need help? **[Discord](https://discord.gg/hq8qPbvznf)**

SINCE WE ARE OFFLOADING A LOT OF LAYERS, 64GB RAM (for BF16 offloading) RECOMMENDED.

TESTED WITH SOLO CONTENT ONLY.

[Relight LoRA](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/resolve/main/LoRAs/Wan22_relight/WanAnimate_relight_lora_fp16.safetensors)

[LightX2V Lora](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/resolve/main/Lightx2v/lightx2v_I2V_14B_480p_cfg_step_distill_rank128_bf16.safetensors)

[Wan 2.2 Animate BF16](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.2_ComfyUI_Repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/diffusion_models/wan2.2_animate_14B_bf16.safetensors)

[Yolo V12 M Face](https://github.com/YapaLab/yolo-face/releases/download/1.0.0/yolov12m-face.pt)

[Yolo V10 ONNX](https://huggingface.co/Wan-AI/Wan2.2-Animate-14B/resolve/main/process_checkpoint/det/yolov10m.onnx)

[ViTPose Large](https://huggingface.co/JunkyByte/easy_ViTPose/resolve/main/onnx/wholebody/vitpose-l-wholebody.onnx)

[UMT5 Encoder BF16](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/resolve/main/umt5-xxl-enc-bf16.safetensors)

[BF16 VAE](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/blob/main/Wan2_1_VAE_bf16.safetensors)

Last time I checked, you have to install this manually:

[https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-WanAnimatePreprocess](https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-WanAnimatePreprocess)

Optional
--------
Crop out a face from a larger image by drawing a mask. If you don't draw a mask, we will reference the full image.

Memory Tips
-----------
* use torch compile
* reduce context frames
  (minimum 48, always use 
   close to half for 
   overlap)
* reduce resolution
* use vae en/decode
  (decrease tile size if
   needed)
Turn on context options when frames are over 81

yolov10m  / vitpose onnx goes to:
ComfyUI/models/detection

Default Shift is 5
so if you don't like the results, switch back to Euler + 5 shift

^
merge_loras saves vram for me but i think it temporarily uses more system ram for its operations

I find it a whole frame behind usally.
0.0625 = 1/16fps
